Also, regarding your question about Sprite, we serve it in cans.
Once you place your order, it typically takes about 30 to 45 minutes for the pizza to arrive, depending on your location and the time of day.

The cost for a small margarita pizza and a can of Sprite will depend on our current pricing. Unfortunately, I don't have access to the pricing information at the moment. However, you can check our menu or contact the shop directly for the most accurate pricing.
